```{r}
calc_streak <- function(x){
  y <- rep(0,length(x))
  y[x == "H"] <- 1
  y <- c(0, y, 0)
  wz <- which(y == 0)
  streak <- diff(wz) - 1
  return(streak)
}

kobe_streak <- tibble(length = calc_streak(kobe_basket$shot))

```
